EmailTemplate.name: HR Contract Expiration Date Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Contract Expiration Date Notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Passport Expiration Notice:
Please note that {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName}'s passport will be expiring soon. See details below:
Passport Number: {!Account.ID_Number__c}Passport Expiration Date: {!Account.Passport_Expiration_Date__c}
Consult Employee record for more details.
